extendedInfo.description: Credit Sesame enables you to view your Experian credit score and monitor important changes to your credit reportâall for FREE, wherever you are.With our safe and secure app, you can monitor the real cost of your credit cards, loans and mortgage and get unbiased advice to help you take action and save money. Plus, see how your credit score has changed over time and learn how you can protect or improve your financial standing. There are no fees and no credit card is required.Credit SesameâSmarter financing for your world.EASILY MANAGE YOUR CREDIT AND LOANS WHEREVER YOU AREâ¢ Track your Experian credit score every month for FREEâ¢ Improve and protect your credit score with free credit monitoringâ¢ Get analysis of your existing credit and loansâ¢ Looking to purchase a home? Our Home Buying Power feature can tell you how much home you can actually afford â¢ Find new mortgage and home refinancing optionsâ¢ Save money with our unbiased recommendationsâ¢ Online or on-the-go, your mobile and web accounts are always in syncYOUR PRIVACY AND SECURITY ARE OUR PRIORITYâ¢ Bank level encryption practices ensure that with Credit Sesame, your information is always safeâ¢ Your account and personal data is protected with a unique four digit PINâ¢ Mobile access to your account can easily be deactivated from your CreditSesame.com profile page if your mobile device is lost or stolenAS FEATURED IN...â¢ The Wall Street Journalâ¢ The New York Timesâ¢ NBCâs TODAY Showâ¢ CNN Moneyâ¢ CNBC

reviews.title: Crashed
reviews.comment: Right after I put in my information to sign up and get my data the app crashed and said network error

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Get yo credit in order with unique understanding.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Faie
reviews.comment: This app is good but it doesn\'t update your score as well as credit karma which actually uses one of the three credit reporting agencies to get your score
reviews.author: Kendall Brooks

reviews.title: Makes reviewing ur credit much easier.
reviews.comment: Also don\'t have to worry about your card getting charged after a month if u don\'t cancel in time like allot of other credit services.
reviews.author: Chad Randall Harrigan

reviews.title: Don\'t be fooled..
reviews.comment: This score is NOT your FICO score! Score shown here is not the score lenders see on your reports. The score this app gave me was actually 120 points higher than it really was! I tried this app when looking for a home thinking I\'d get approved bc of the score this app gave, lender showed me my real score. Only thing this app is good for is your credit report. Score given here is simply a guesstimate based on your credit report.
reviews.author: Niki Carroll

reviews.title: Updates regular
reviews.comment: I have no complaints on this appear other than my credit score here doesn\'t match the reported score from other apps. May be bc of the different reporting agencies
reviews.author: Melissa Montavon

reviews.title: Great free app
reviews.comment: Nice fako
reviews.author: Shawn Horan

reviews.title: AWESOME!
reviews.comment: This is such an easy to use app! Not only do I receive regular updates but Credit Sesame always provides me with great advice on how I can achieve my financial goals. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!
reviews.author: Mike Yakovlev

reviews.title: Not Accurate
reviews.comment: Was 100 points higher than my actual credit score from the credit bureau...so not an accurate app...srry
reviews.author: dan doorn

reviews.title: Very cool app
reviews.comment: Thanks for this
reviews.author: McArthur Mitchel

reviews.title: Credit score
reviews.comment: Having access to my potential score is helpful it allows me to know when to apply for other cards
reviews.author: Christine Irvin

reviews.title: Its a great app
reviews.comment: People really need to understand their credit score, and the different SCORES that come with their credit. This is your Experian credit score... it matches the score given with your Experian credit report. Your FICO score can be completely different... but that doesnt mean that the score given here is any less valid. And your \"score\" on the same report could vary depending on whose looking... u can apply for a mortgage and a car loan on the same day and get a different score depending on the criteria used.
reviews.author: Jaymie Mason

reviews.title: No changes but good support
reviews.comment: Had this for like 2 months.  Has not pulled any info since.  no inquiries, history, not cc.

reviews.comment: Good app thank u

reviews.title: Keeps me on top of things!
reviews.comment: I am constantly updated on what is going on as far as my credit is concerned. The app makes it so easy to check in and see what\'s going on with my credit score and any changes to my credit. Very easy to use!
